comment: Main text block containing Chinese characters in vertical columns, likely from a classical text such as the Shuowen Jiezi. The text includes definitions, phonetic notations (e.g., '讀若詩', '切'), and structural analysis of characters. The layout is traditional, with right-to-left reading order. Marginal notes include '大十' and '說文四上' indicating volume/page information, and '仲奇' possibly denoting a publisher or annotator.
